Title: The Hangover
Plot: Angelenos Doug Billings and Tracy Garner are about to get married. Two days before the wedding, the four men in the wedding party - Doug, Doug's two best buddies Phil Wenneck and Stu Price, and Tracy's brother Alan Garner - hop into Tracy's father's beloved Mercedes convertible for a 24-hour stag party to Las Vegas. Phil, a married high school teacher, has the same maturity level as his students when he's with his pals. Stu, a dentist, is worried about everything, especially what his controlling girlfriend Melissa thinks. Because she disapproves of traditional male bonding rituals, Stu has to lie to her about the stag, he telling her that they are going on a wine tasting tour in the Napa Valley. Regardless, he intends on eventually marrying her, against the advice and wishes of his friends. And Alan seems to be unaware of what are considered the social graces of the western world. The morning after their arrival in Las Vegas, they awaken in their hotel suite each with the worst ...
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 12 wins & 25 nominations.
Stars: Zach Galifianakis, Bradley Cooper, Justin Bartha, Ed Helms
Companies: Warner Bros., Legendary Entertainment, Green Hat Films
Keywords: female frontal nudity,female nudity,hangover,scantily clad female,bachelor party

Similars.Title: The Hangover Part II
Similars.Plot: Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry.
Similars.Stars: Bradley Cooper, Zach Galifianakis, Ed Helms

Similars.Title: The Hangover Part III
Similars.Plot: When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run.
Similars.Stars: Bradley Cooper, Zach Galifianakis, Ed Helms

Similars.Title: Ted
Similars.Plot: John Bennett, a man whose childhood wish of bringing his teddy bear to life came true, now must decide between keeping the relationship with the bear, Ted or his girlfriend, Lori.
Similars.Stars: Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis, Seth MacFarlane

Similars.Title: 21 Jump Street

Similars.Title: 22 Jump Street

Similars.Stars: Channing Tatum, Jonah Hill, Ice Cube

Similars.Title: Superbad
Similars.Plot: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.
Similars.Stars: Michael Cera, Jonah Hill, Christopher Mintz-Plasse

Similars.Plot: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.
Similars.Stars: Jason Sudeikis, Jennifer Aniston, Emma Roberts

Similars.Title: Horrible Bosses
Similars.Plot: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

Similars.Title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
Similars.Plot: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.
Similars.Stars: Steve Carell, Catherine Keener, Paul Rudd

Similars.Plot: After they are forced to live next to a fraternity house, a couple with a newborn baby do whatever they can to take them down.

Similars.Title: Due Date
